statements: SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, rating, date_submitted FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE date_submitted BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT MAX(rating) AS max_rating FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT DATE_SUB(date_submitted, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS prev_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 3
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback_data WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feature_name, description FROM product_features WHERE feature_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE customer_id IN (3, 5);
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT feature_name, description FROM product_features WHERE feature_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedback_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 4;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating, MIN(rating) AS lowest_rating FROM feedback_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = '123456';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT feature_name, feature_description FROM product_features WHERE feature_status = 'active';
SELECT satisfaction_id, satisfaction_score FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE customer_id = '789012' ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feature_name, feature_description FROM product_features WHERE feature_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT satisfaction_id) AS satisfaction_count FROM customer_satisfaction GROUP BY customer_id HAVING satisfaction_count > 5 ORDER BY satisfaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedbackData;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedbackData WHERE customer_id = '1a2b3c4d';
SELECT product_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_feedback FROM CustomerFeedbackData GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT feature_name, feature_description FROM ProductFeatures WHERE feature_id = '5e6f7g8h';
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score, satisfaction_date FROM CustomerSatisfaction ORDER BY satisfaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedbackData ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedbackData WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feedback_text, product_id FROM CustomerFeedbackData WHERE feedback_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
SELECT feature_name, feature_description FROM ProductFeatures WHERE feature_name LIKE '%improvement%';
SELECT customer_id, AVG(satisfaction_score) AS avg_score FROM CustomerSatisfaction GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_score > 4 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT order_date, total_price FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT rating, comment FROM ratings WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT name,email,phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT product_name,category,price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT order_id,order_date,total_price FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 5 AND total_price < 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customers.name, products.product_name, orders.quantity FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id
